title: PM to kick off formal campaign for Oct. 21 election on Wednesday - sources
text:
PM to kick off formal campaign for Oct. 21 election on Wednesday - sources

Economy 13 hours ago (Sep 10, 2019 13:50)

© Reuters. Canada's PM to kick off formal campaign for Oct. 21 election on Wednesday - sources OTTAWA, Sept 10 (Reuters) - Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau will formally launch the campaign for the Oct. 21 national election on Wednesday, sources from his party said, setting up what polls now indicate will be a tight race for re-election. Trudeau is expected to visit the Ottawa residence of Governor General Julie Payette, the acting head of state, to formally launch the race on Wednesday at 10:00 a.m. ET, sources said.

PM to kick off formal campaign for Oct. 21 election on Wednesday - sources
